info.title: Aerospike Management Console
info.description: Aerospike Management Console is used to manage and monitor Aerospike Database Clusters.

get.description: Get AMC Server Version and Information

Get the list of user connections

Required security scopes:
  * `api:general`

post.description:
Register or Update a new connection for user

Required security scopes:
  * `api:general`

get.description:
Get the user connection

Required security scopes:
  * `api:general`

post.description:
Connect to the cluster and return the entity tree

Required security scopes:
  * `api:general`

delete.description:
Delete a connection

Required security scopes:
  * `api:general`

get.description:
Query a cluster's modules

Required security scopes:
  * `api:general`

post.description:
Save a module in the cluster

Required security scopes:
  * `api:general`

get.description:
Get a cluster's module

Required security scopes:
  * `api:general`

delete.description:
Drop a module from the cluster

Required security scopes:
  * `api:general`

get.description:
Get the list of users

Required security scopes:
  * `api:admin`

post.description:
Register or Update a new user

Required security scopes:
  * `api:admin`

get.description:
Get the list of users

Required security scopes:
  * `api:admin`

delete.description:
Delete a user

Required security scopes:
  * `api:admin`

user.description: AMC User Name (this is not the same as Database user name)

host.description: Node Host. Valid DNS, IPv4 or IPv6 value

connectOnLogin.description: Should AMC connect to this cluster automatically after user login?

roles.description: Valid roles are: admin, ops, dev

code.description: an application-specific error code, expressed as a string value.

detail.description: a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
detail.example: Value of ID must be an integer

id.description: a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

meta.description: a meta object containing non-standard meta-information about the error.

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value.

example.detail: Value of ID must be an integer

jwt.description:
**Security Scopes**:
  * `api:cluster`: API access to cluster resources
jwt.name: Authorization
